stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  RESPECTED  GET READY TO READ
comments: Dr. Patterson is incredibly passionate about his profession and is not only the most knowledgeable professor I\'ve met at USF, but also someone I can truly say I respect. Taking Ethics with him was a privilege, especially given the fact that he is on the ethics committee in san francisco.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: TPat is an excellent professor, one of the best in the Counseling Psychology/MFT program.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: They say \'those who cannot do, teach\' In the case of an ethics class, its doubly scary! Answers swerve from legal to immoral at the whim of the teacher, who is happy to single out some poor hapless students for vendettas . TP is a sad case for the department not allowing students to choose their sections at USF.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Know it all, try to avoid at all costs! Very negative.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Students write page of questions based on reading. Entire class time is devoted to answering those questions. Tests are multiple choice & the answers are debatable. Ex:you pick A & your classmate picks B and & teacher says the answer is A. Then your classmate argues for answer B & the teacher changes the correct answer to B,& now A is incorrect.
